BNC User Reference Guide

<elementPolicy>

elementPolicy specifies the XAIRA indexing policy to be used for one or more elements.
Class att.identifiable
Declaration 
element elementPolicy
{
   att.identifiable.attribute.ident,
   att.identifiable.attribute.ns,
   attribute type { "none" | "children" | "content" | "markup" }?,
   nameList?
}
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes and those inherited from [att.identifiable ] )
type specifies the required indexing policy. .
Status: Optional
Legal values are:
none no part of the element or its content will be indexed.
children no part of the element will be indexed, but any child elements will be.
content only the text and child content of the element will be indexed.
markup only the start and end tags for the element and any child elements not otherwise specified will be indexed.
Module module-from-bncxml
